techniques.comment: 1.01, 1.02, 1.03, 5.04 - Cloud Identity Logs (Google Workspace Login), Audit Logs - Data Access - Which users accessed data in the "accounts" table in the past month?, Login occurred from a highly-privileged account(e.g. Super Admin, Organization Admin), Suspicious login attempts flagged by Google Workspace, Excessive login failures from any user identity ( >= 3)
1.03 - Cloud Identity Logs (Google Workspace Login) - Excessive login failures from any user identity ( >= 3)

1.1, 1.2, 3.1 - Audit Logs - Policy, HTTP(S) LB Logs, Audit Logs - Admin Activity - Access attempts violating Identity-Aware Proxy (IAP) access controls, Unusual admin activity by user & country in the last 7 days, Access attempts violating VPC service controls
2.01 - Audit Logs - Admin Activity (Google Workspace Admin) - Super admin or Admin permissions granted

2.1, 2.11, 2.2, 2.21, 2.22, 2.4 - Audit Logs - Admin Activity - User access added (or removed) from IAP-protected HTTPS services, Permissions granted over a Service Account, Permissions granted to create or manage Service Account keys, Organization admin permissions granted, Permissions granted to a user from a non-allowed domain, Permissions granted to impersonate Service Account
2.3 - Audit Logs - Admin Activity - Service accounts or keys created by non-approved identity
3.01 - Audit Logs - Admin Activity - Changes made to logging settings
3.11, 3.12 - Audit Logs - Admin Activity - Firewall rules modified or deleted in the last 24 hrs, Unusual number of firewall rules modified in the last 7 days
3.13 - Audit Logs - Admin Activity - VPN tunnels created or deleted

3.14, 3.15, 3.2, 3.21 - Audit Logs - Admin Activity - SQL databases created, modified or deleted in the last 7 days, DNS zones modified or deleted, Storage buckets modified or deleted by unfamiliar user identities, VMs deleted in the last 7 days
4.01 - Audit Logs - Unusually high API usage by any user identity
4.1, 4.11 - Audit Logs - Admin Activity - Autoscaling usage in the past month broken by day, Autoscaling usage in the past month

5.01, 5.02, 5.03, 5.05, 5.06, 5.07, 5.09, 5.2, 5.3, 5.31 - Audit Logs - Data Access - Which users most frequently accessed data in the past week?, Cloud Storage objects accessed from a new IP(60-day lookback), Cloud Storage buckets enumerated by unfamiliar users, What tables are most frequently accessed and by whom?, Any queries doing very large scans?, Most common data (and metadata) access actions in the past month, Any exfiltration queries or jobs (i.e. copy or extract)?, Which users accessed most amount of data in the past week?, How much data was accessed by each user per day in the past week?, Top 10 queries against BigQuery in the past week
5.08 - Audit Logs - Any destructive queries or jobs (i.e. update or delete)?
6.01 - VPC Flow Logs - Hosts reaching out to many other hosts or ports per hour (indicating potential scanning activity)
6.1 - VPC Flow Logs - Connections from a new IP to an in-scope network(GDPR, PCI, etc.)

6.11, 6.2, 6.31 - Cloud IDS Logs, HTTP(S) LB Logs, VPC Flow Logs - Traffic sessions correlated to high severity threats detected by Cloud IDS, Connections to a malicious IP, Connections blocked by Cloud Armor
6.21, 6.22 - HTTP(S) LB Logs - List remote IP addresses attempting to exploit Log4j 2 vulnerability, Log4j 2 vulnerability exploit attempts
6.3 - Cloud IDS Logs - Virus or malware detected by Cloud IDS
6.4 - Cloud DNS Logs - Top 10 DNS queried domains
